## Exercise 01

### (a)

```{r loading and cleaning votes, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
## Loading in Data
votes_time_series <- read_csv("data/votes_time_series.csv")

## Replacing NAs with 0s
votes_103 <- votes_time_series %>%
  mutate_all(funs(ifelse(is.na(.), 0, .))) %>%
  filter(session==103)
```
